question: Question_02_(g)
hints:
You don't even need to use the expression for $f(x)$; the answers from
parts a - f should be sufficient to draw the graph.

Try going step by step.

\begin{enumerate}
\itemsep1pt\parskip0pt\parsep0pt
\item
  Draw the asymptotes (part f).
\item
  Draw the local maxima and minima (part e).
\item
  Draw the inflection point (part e).
\item
  Look at where the function is increasing/decreasing (part c) and try
  to connect the points you've already drawn.
\end{enumerate}
